item.title: How do i make member items ?/
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

In your wearing method, make it check the item which you are trying to wear, if they are a member, they can successfully wield it, if not, it doesn’t equip and sends a message to the player.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make member items ?/
item.dc:creator: @Djayboi6 Dj_
item.description:
@Djayboi6 wrote:

You Have To Make A Member Zone By Finding A Place You like,Make A portal That Teles You To That Area Make Sure That Your Server Needs MemberShip Though,From Their U Should Find It In Client.Java Where You Put Your Portal And Add That You Need Membership Rights To Enter
Find A Shop on The Npc List For Moparscape
And Edit The Shop With The Items U Dont Want NonMembers To Use

Same Thing Applys With Mod Zones Admin Zonea Etc
I Might Not Be Right But Gl If I Did help

item.source: How do i make member items ?/

item.title: How do i make member items ?/
item.dc:creator: @Eddie12390 Eddie12390
item.description:
@Eddie12390 wrote:

If you want to make members only items, you have to add a way of making the server know if someones a member. I saw a tutorial somewhere, but I am not going to leech it.

Search Google for “Runescape Private Server Add Membership”

I followed a tutorial and when i want something to be members only, I put “member == 1” inside the parentheses where player rights etc would be.

To make the item members only you need to do what you would do for making an item staff only except use the members code, as an example mine would be “member == 1” to make it a members only item.

Also, please work on your spelling, I had trouble reading what you said at first.

Read full topic
